alert.note: Alert for Northern Rosebud (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 4:06PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Rosebud County through 445 PM MDT... At 405 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles southeast of Hillside, or 29 miles northwest of Miles City. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Heavy rain, winds in excess of 40 mph, and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Angela. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
